name: Trinere
bio: The legendary Miami vocalist was Pretty Tony’s #1 hitmaker (and girlfriend) turning out enduring freestyle anthems like “They’re Playing Our Song.”

name: Lisa Lisa
bio: One-third of Lisa Lisa & The Cult Jam, she achieved huge fame with 1985 hits like “I Wonder If I Take You Home” and “Can You Feel the Beat.”

name: Louis “Kayel” Sharpe
bio: The figurehead of male trio TKA, a long-lasting freestyle group who rose to fame with 1986’s “One Way Love,” produced by Latin Rascals.

name: Louie Vega
bio: Resident DJ at Devil’s Nest and Heartthrob, he produced (and broke) many freestyle hits before moving on to be a house music kingpin.
